Text.Page:
Glad to meet you, stranger! I hope you will help me. You know, I am a collector of Dragon eggs and recently I start to notice that there is not enough place in my house for my collection. So I decided to change something...
No-no-no! I will not throw away my precious collection! But I have an idea... I will collect tiny Dragon eggs!
I know, I know you want to ask me how it will happen because dragons and their eggs are so huge. Listen.
I will craft it by myself. A tiny dragon egg!
Go on and search dragon eggs, crush them and bring me shells from it.
Of course I will give you special fee for your work!

Shell X 100


Gather the needed materials and get the reward!

If you accept text 'Easter commotion' will disappear.

You know... I found that there are no suitable storage shelves to keep such a tiny egg in my house. So, then, why don't you hang onto that? I heard that if you paint it with special dye you will get something special too.

The material is insufficient.

Shell X 100

Gather the needed materials and get reward!
